title: Boy, 11, accidentally shoots self in southwest Detroit
content:
An 11-year-old boy accidentally shot himself in southwest Detroit early Thursday morning, according to Detroit Police.
Officer Jennifer Moreno said the shooting happened around 8:30 a.m. in the 3900 block of West Vernor Highway and officers are still at the scene investigating.
Moreno said more details were not immediately available and it's unclear how the boy obtained the gun.
Contact Katrease Stafford: Kstafford@freepress.com or 313-223-4759.
